name: Fittest Survival
description:
Instructions!

WASD To Move

Mouse Scroll Wheel To Move Up And Down

Tab To Access Inventory

Click Human To Select

 Right Click Selected Human To Hold Position

To Equip A Weapon,  Click Human Then Access Inventory And Click A Weapon Of Choice

To Access Build Panel - Mouse Button 2/ Middle Mouse Button

Left Click To Select

Right Click To Place

40 Downloads I will release the premium version.

I Appreciate Donations

Recognise Human Tier

No Health Bar - Tier 1

Green Health Bar - Tier 2

Yellow Health Bar - Tier 3

Red Health Bar - Tier 4 (Premium)

Blue Health Bar - Tier 5 (Premium)
